name: chr
description: Converts a numeric value to a UCS-2 character.

params.name: number
params.description: The UCS-2 code value (a number in the range 0 - 65535)

links.title: Unicode UCS-2 Code Chart
links.description: Cheatsheet with all the UCS-2 characters and their hexadecimal(!) representation

examples.title: Character and value of Korean currency symbol ( unicode number 8361 )
